attributes.action: Stop the introduction of Covid19 passports and Mandatory Vaccinations.
attributes.additional_details:
Covid19 passports

It does not make sense to introduce this system. 
When death rates are dropping and there is no significant data to Link the new variant to implementing this mandate. 


Mandatory Vaccinations.

The introduction in E.U and Non E.U counties where it is NOW mandatory for vaccines.
This must not happen in the U.K

Which is against human rights under Common Law.
attributes.background: To stop the process of this introduction of Covid19 passports and Mandatory Vaccinations.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239

Do not make vaccination against Covid-19 mandatory: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602282
